active_alerts.title: Alewife Escalator 353 (Main concourse to busway) unavailable due to maintenance
Bowdoin Escalator 125 (Lobby to street) is unavailable until further notice.
active_alerts.description:
The escalator will remain out of service for the foreseeable future. This decision was made after a thorough inspection determined that corrosion on the escalator’s steel truss was so severe that it could not be repaired further and that a complete replacement of the escalator would be required. Replacing the escalator at this location requires a more extended unit meeting modern escalator safety requirements. This longer unit will require significant alteration to the station entrance to meet code requirements. The MBTA has currently begun design work to understand what station upgrades will be needed. 
  
Due to these complexities, we expect the escalator will remain out of service for a significant time. We recognize the challenges this poses to our riders, and please know we are working to identify a solution as quickly as possible. In the meantime, Government Center Station, which is fully accessible and serves the Blue Line, is under a quarter-mile from Bowdoin Station.

active_alerts.title: Lynn Parking Garage arcade stairs 1 & 2 are closed until further notice. Customers may exit the garage via elevators to the ground level or
active_alerts.description: Vehicular access to the upper 2 levels of the garage is restricted. The garage has sufficient parking capacity to accommodate daily demand.

active_alerts.title: Haymarket Elevator 903 (Oak Grove platform to Congress Street lobby) unavailable due to maintenance
active_alerts.description: To exit, take Haymarket Elevator 907 to the Orange Line underpass, then proceed to the end of the hallway and use Haymarket Elevator 906 to access the Green Line platform. At the Green Line platform, turn right and proceed to the lobby and use Haymarket Elevator 908 to access the busway. To board the Orange Line, take Haymarket Elevator 904 to the Forest Hills platform, then proceed to the end of the platform and use Haymarket Elevator 905 to access the Orange Line underpass. At the underpass, use Haymarket Elevator 907 to access the Oak Grove platform.

active_alerts.title: Jackson Sq: The stairway connecting the lobby & the south end of the platform is closed. Use the stairway at the north end of the platform.
Malden Center Escalator 312 (Street level to Commuter Rail platform) unavailable due to maintenance.
There is no accessible path connecting the inb. & outb. platforms at Wellesley Sq Sta. The existing path includes steep slopes & is long.
active_alerts.description: There are accessible mini-high platforms at the Western end of both the Track 1 and Track 2 sides. However, the existing pedestrian path between the two sides is long and includes steep slopes, especially on the Crest Road bridge over the tracks. Designs are underway to provide for a fully compliant pathway.

active_alerts.title: Park St Elevator 808 (Red Line center platform to Government Center & North platform, Winter St Concourse) unavailable through Sun Oct 5
active_alerts.description:
The elevator will be closed for major equipment upgrades that will significantly improve the long-term reliability of this elevator.

To exit: from the Red Line Center platform, take Park Street Elevator 979 to the Green Line Copley & West platform. Exit faregates. Take Elevator 978 to the Boston Common. 

To Red Line: from street level, take Park Street Elevator 978 on the Boston Common to the Green Line Copley & West lobby. Enter faregates. Turn left. Take Elevator 979 to the Red Line center platform. \n\n

To Red Line: from Winter St Concourse, go to the end of the Green Line Gov Ctr & North platform. Use Elevator 812. Turn left. Take Elevator 823 to the Copley & West platform. Go to the east end of the platform. Take Elevator 979 to the Red Line center platform.

active_alerts.title: A new Prov Ln schedule will be in effect on Mon, Sep 8. These changes reflect the Amtrak infrastructure repair progress
Chinatown Elev. 876 will be unavailable from Mon Sep 22 through Mon Nov 3 for major equipment upgrades
active_alerts.description:
The elevator will be closed for work that will significantly improve its long-term reliability.

To Exit:
Take an Oak Grove Train to Downtown Crossing; then take Downtown Crossing elevator 891 to Franklin Street. At Franklin Street customers should turn left and travel 450 feet south on Washington Street then take Downtown Crossing elevator 892 to the Forest Hills platform. Then take a Forest Hills Train to Chinatown and use elevator 922 to exit the station.

To Board:
Go to Chinatown Elevator 922 on Essex St. Take Elevator 922 to the Forest Hills platform. Take a Forest Hills train to Tufts Medical Center. Transfer to an Oak Grove train.
